languages.text: "А я, в свою очередь, запомню ваше милостивое отношение. И вспомню о нем, когда почтенный Каллигос Винтерскейл вернется и узнает, что Футфол более не под его покровительством".

traits.locale_text: "А я, в свою очередь, запомню ваше милостивое отношение. И вспомню о нем, когда почтенный Каллигос Винтерскейл вернется и узнает, что Футфол более не под его покровительством".

languages.text: "And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."
languages.original_text: "А я, в свою очередь, запомню ваше милостивое отношение. И вспомню о нем, когда почтенный Каллигос Винтерскейл вернется и узнает, что Футфол более не под его покровительством".

traits.locale_text: "And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."
"And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."
"And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."
"And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."
"And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."

languages.text: 「そして私も、君の親切な対応を忘れはしない。敬愛するカリゴス・ウィンタースケールが戻ってきて、フットフォールがもう彼の支援下にないと知ったとき、私は君の親切を思い出すだろう」
languages.original_text: "And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."

traits.locale_text: 「そして私も、君の親切な対応を忘れはしない。敬愛するカリゴス・ウィンタースケールが戻ってきて、フットフォールがもう彼の支援下にないと知ったとき、私は君の親切を思い出すだろう」

languages.text: “作为答谢，我也会记住您的亲切态度。当尊敬的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔回来的时候，他会发现落脚港已经不再受他的赞助了。”
languages.original_text: "And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."

traits.locale_text: “作为答谢，我也会记住您的亲切态度。当尊敬的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔回来的时候，他会发现落脚港已经不再受他的赞助了。”

languages.text: «Y yo, por mi parte, recordaré su amabilidad. Pero lo haré cuando regrese el admirable Calligos Winterscale y descubra que Paso ya no está bajo su patrocinio».
languages.original_text: "And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."

traits.locale_text: «Y yo, por mi parte, recordaré su amabilidad. Pero lo haré cuando regrese el admirable Calligos Winterscale y descubra que Paso ya no está bajo su patrocinio».

languages.text: « Quant à moi, je n'oublierai pas votre attitude bienveillante... notamment lorsqu'à son retour, l'honorable Calligos Winterscale découvrira que Castel n'est plus sous sa protection. »
languages.original_text: "And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à moi, je n'oublierai pas votre attitude bienveillante... notamment lorsqu'à son retour, l'honorable Calligos Winterscale découvrira que Castel n'est plus sous sa protection. »

languages.text: "Und ich werde mich an Eure großzügige Haltung stets erinnern. Auch dann, wenn der geschätzte Calligos Winterzunder zurückkehrt und entdeckt, dass Footfall nicht länger unser seiner Patronage steht."
languages.original_text: "And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich werde mich an Eure großzügige Haltung stets erinnern. Auch dann, wenn der geschätzte Calligos Winterzunder zurückkehrt und entdeckt, dass Footfall nicht länger unser seiner Patronage steht."

languages.text: "Karşılığında ben de lütufkâr tavrınızı unutmayacak ve saygıdeğer Calligos Winterscale geri dönüp Binliman'ın artık himayesi altında olmadığını fark ettiğinde bunu hatırlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "And I, in turn, will remember your gracious attitude. And I'll remember it when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns to discover that Footfall is no longer under his patronage."

traits.locale_text: "Karşılığında ben de nazik tavrınızı unutmayacak ve saygıdeğer Calligos Winterscale geri dönüp Binliman'ın artık himayesi altında olmadığını keşfettiğinde bunu hatırlayacağım."
